meanings: seize[grab, take, get hold of] the opportunity

vlive.korean: [틈새 발견 세상 길고 긴 팀명 외치기] 각 팀의 팀명을 한번 외쳐볼까요? will you please shout the team name? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.9

vlive.korean: [틈새 공략] 미쳤냐? 뭐야, 형 나야? [Niche attack] What, you had me? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87

examples.korean: The floor is sealed to prevent water penetration. 발음듣기 바닥에는 물이 스며들지 않도록 틈새가 완전히 메워져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The floor is sealed to prevent water penetration. 발음

examples.korean: A cheaper range of products was introduced to plug the gap at the lower end of the market. 발음듣기 그 시장의 저가 부문에 있는 틈새를 메우기 위해 더 가격이 싼 일련의 상품들이 도입되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A cheaper range of products was introduced to plug the gap at the lower end of the market. 발음

examples.korean: The product has filled a gap in the market. 발음듣기 그 상품이 시장의 틈새를 메워 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The product has filled a gap in the market. 발음

examples.korean: We think we’ve identified a gap in the market. 발음듣기 우리는 우리가 시장에서 빈자리[틈새]를 찾아냈다고 생각한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We think we’ve identified a gap in the market. 발음

examples.korean: They spotted a niche in the market, with no serious competition. 발음듣기 그들은 시장에서 경쟁이 심하지 않은 틈새를 찾아냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They spotted a niche in the market, with no serious competition. 발음
